text: Malek Jaziri was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Uladzimir Ignatik won the title after defeating Andrey Rublev 6–7(6–8), 6–3, 7–6(7–5) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Open de Rennes - Singles Category:Open de Rennes
title: 2017 Open de Rennes – Singles
